abstract: International House Hunting column; dormered wooden home with French Provence flare in Helsinki, Finland, suburb of Kauniainen is listed at $1,796,700; information about market and tips for buying properties in Finland highlighted.
snippet: The housing market in Finland has been weak for the last several years, though this year has shown a slight improvement over 2015.
lead_paragraph: The housing market in Finland has been weak for the last several years, though this year has shown a slight improvement over 2015.
